content: the woven warmth crochet hat is part of a fabulous warm and cozy crochet pattern set made with **red heart super saver brushed** https //www yarnspirations com/products/red-heart-super-saver-brushed-yarn &utm_source=influencer_moogly&utm_medium=blog&utm_campaign=2024_9_wovenwarmth inspired by warm up america s drive to collect hats scarves and mittens this autumn this set of patterns features a brand-new crochet stitch and lots of love this stitch pattern is created by working two row of mesh in one color and then weaving the first row of mesh in the next color through those row i first figured it out with the scarf and then figured out how to work it in rounds for the woven warmth crochet hat
